attributes.action: Make The National Lottery Fairer i.e more millionaires
attributes.additional_details: Now is the time for the Lottery commission to take action on the fact that instead of 1 person winning jackpot how about there are 2 or 3 millionaires a week instead of rolling over.The Euro millions is Unfair in the fact that many people are losing out and with jackpots reaching into double and treble figure payouts l and probably the whole nation must agree that we would prefer to see numerous more prizes instead of the scale at what is offered.
